recipe.title: Zucchini "Linguini" With Roasted Shrimp Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 lb ; shrimp, peeled and deveined ; (455 g)
½ ; yellow bell pepper, sliced thin

steps.step: Using a vegetable peeler, peel long strips from the zucchini.
In a large bowl, mix the zucchini strips, shrimp, bell pepper sliced, lime juice, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and olive oil until the mixture is evenly coated.
On a roasting tray, spread the mixture into one even layer and bake for 8 minutes.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Using a vegetable peeler, peel long strips from the zucchini.
In a large bowl, mix the zucchini strips, shrimp, bell pepper sliced, lime juice, salt, pepper, garlic powder, and olive oil until the mixture is evenly coated.
On a roasting tray, spread the mixture into one even layer and bake for 8 minutes.
